short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle netflix subtitle visibilty by one key press

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For using this extension you should turn on the Netflix subtitle and keep it on. Then you can show/hide it by pressing "V" key on your keyboard.

Here are the steps you need to follow:
- Add this extension to your Chrome browser
- Open netflix.com and start watching your favourite content
- Turn on the Netflix subtitle in any language you want
- Now you can hide/show the subtitle by pressing the "V" key
